text: My wife & I got the #CovidVaccine shot to protect her mom & other residents in #LTC. We are #essentialfamilycaregivers. At first, we were a bit hesitant to get the #vaccine. We're glad we did with no side effects. It's the  least we could do #COVID19 @FamilyCouncils @RyersonNIA https://t.co/TK0kItjYxk
